sentences.en: Simple and succinct, this program has perspicuous interface and extensive application.
sentences.cn: 该程序应用简单, 界面明了,适用范围广.

sentences.en: Such solutions were more manageable, more perspicuous, and more readily used for calculation.
sentences.cn: 这样的解,在计算中是更易于掌握的, 更明白的, 并且是更易于使用的.

sentences.en: The most perspicuous physical characteristic of the porosity of a soil rock matrix is its continuity.
sentences.cn: 岩土格架的孔隙率的最清晰的物理特性是它的连续性.

sentences.en: This program has perspicuous interface and extensive application.
sentences.cn: 该程序界面明了，适用范围广。

words.tran_cn: 明了的；清晰明白的；易懂的

trans.tran_cn: 说话清楚的，明白易懂的
trans.tran_en: (of speech or writing) easily understood; lucid
